languages.text: [Взглянуть в глаза Маражаю] "Мое предложение все еще в силе. Как насчет смены стороны, за которую ты сражаешься?"

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к Маражаю] "Кажется, твои сородичи не сильно тебя жалуют. Как насчет смены стороны, за которую ты сражаешься?"

languages.text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"
languages.original_text: [Взглянуть в глаза Маражаю] "Мое предложение все еще в силе. Как насчет смены стороны, за которую ты сражаешься?"

traits.locale_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"
[Address Marazhai] "It appears that your kin are not too fond of you. Would you consider switching sides?"
[Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"
[Address Marazhai] "It appears that your kin are not too fond of you. Would you consider switching sides?"
[Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"
[Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"
[Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

languages.text: [Regarder Marazhai dans les yeux] « Mon offre tient toujours. Envisageriez-vous de vous joindre à mon entourage ? »
languages.original_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

traits.locale_text: [S'adresser à Marazhai] « On dirait que vos semblables ne vous apprécient guère. Envisageriez-vous de vous joindre à mon entourage ? »

languages.text: [直视玛拉斋的双眼]“我的提议依然有效，你考不考虑来我这边？”
languages.original_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

traits.locale_text: [对玛拉斋开口]“看来你的族人不怎么喜欢你，要不要考虑来我这边？”

languages.text: ［マラズハイを見つめる］「私の申し出はまだ有効だ。こちら側に付く気はないか？」
languages.original_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

traits.locale_text: ［マラズハイを見つめる］「私の申し出はまだ有効だ。こちら側に付く気はないか？」

languages.text: [Marazhai ins Auge sehen] "Meine Angebot gilt noch. Könntet Ihr Euch vorstellen, die Seiten zu wechseln?"
languages.original_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

traits.locale_text: [An Marazhai wenden] "Es wirkt so, als würde Euch Eure Art nicht besonders mögen. Könntet Ihr Euch vorstellen, die Seiten zu wechseln?"

languages.text: [Mirar a Marazhai a los ojos] «Mi oferta sigue en pie. ¿Considerarías cambiar de bando?».
languages.original_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a Marazhai] «Parece que tu especie no te tiene mucha estima. ¿Te plantearías un cambio de bando?».

languages.text: [Marazhai'ın gözlerine bak] "Teklifim hâlâ geçerli. Taraf değiştirmeyi düşünür müydün?"
languages.original_text: [Look Marazhai in the eye] "My offer still stands. Would you consider switching sides?"

traits.locale_text: [Marazhai'ın gözlerine bak] "Teklifim hâlâ geçerli. Taraf değiştirmeyi düşünür müydün?"
